Synergists: Tensor Fasciae Latae, Gluteus Medius, Gluteus Minimus, Adductor Magnus, Adductor Longus, Adductor Brevis, Psoas Major, Quadratus Lumborum, Iliocastalis Lumborum, Iliocastalis Thoracis
Important stabilizers (not highlighted): Rectus Abdominis, Erector Spinae, Clavicular (Upper) Pectoralis Major, Anterior Deltoid, Lateral Deltoid, Posterior Deltoid
name: Cable down-up twist
